sentences.sContent: I don't know why I settled on Miami, but anyway I did.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道为什么我落户到了迈阿密，但不管怎样我做了。

synos.tran: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

words.tran: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样

trans.tranOther: You use anyway or anyhow to suggest that a statement is true or relevant in spite of other things that have been said
